abstract: Profile of Mashama Bailey, chef who owns Grey restaurant in Savannah, Ga; Bailey interprets concept of Southern cuisine through filter of her own experience of growing up in New York and training in the South; shares her recipe for pecan pesto.
lead_paragraph: In a building that once held a segregated bus station, the chef Mashama Bailey is redefining African-American cooking in the South.

headline.main: At the Grey in Savannah, History Takes Another Turn

snippet: In a building that once held a segregated bus station, the chef Mashama Bailey is redefining African-American cooking in the South.
